text: The Grandfather () is a 1954 Argentine family drama movie directed by Román Viñoly Barreto and was based on the novel by Benito Pérez Galdós. It stars Enrique Muiño, Mecha Ortiz, Santiago Gómez Cou, Elsa Daniel, Erika Mandel, Florindo Ferrario. ==Other websites== * Category:1954 drama movies Category:1950s family movies Category:Argentine drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Román Viñoly Barreto
title: The Grandfather (1954 movie)
